thanks.translation[0].definitions[0].def: used to tell someone that you are grateful for something they have given you or done for you
thanks.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Thanks a lot for the drink.
Thanks very much for your help.
Many thanks for the lovely flowers.
I’d love to go to the party. Thanks for asking me.
thanks.translation[0].definitions[1].def: used as a polite way of accepting something that someone has offered you
thanks.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: ‘Do you want another cup of coffee?’ ‘Oh, thanks.’
thanks.translation[0].definitions[2].def: used when politely answering someone’s question
thanks.translation[1].definitions[0].def: the things you say or do to show that you are grateful to someone
thanks.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Joe got up and left without a word of thanks.
My thanks to all of you for your help.
thanks.translation[1].note_box[0].sectio: I would like to express my thanks to you for all your support.
We would also like to extend our heartfelt thanks to the medical staff at Broadgreen Hospital.
Let us give thanks for the beauty of the world.
Above all, our thanks go to Barbara Lambourne.
Our grateful thanks go to everyone who took part in the event.
Please accept my most sincere thanks for all your help.
Special thanks are due to John Bryden for his advice.
